note.p: Research Field: Applied physics, electrical engineering

Career: Schoolmaster, Bootham School, York (1870-1875); Lecturer in Physics, University College, Bristol (1876); Professor (1878); Principal and Professor of Applied Physics and Electrical Engineering, City and Guilds Technical College, Finsbury; was a Quaker and a painter
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1917-1918 vol 94 pp xvi-xix, plate, signed by J P
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
